library(dplyr)

library(glue)
library(leaflet)
library(here)

# Read in tidy data

## Tidied observations of Argia sp.

```{r}
#| label: read-argia
#| message: false
argia <- sf::st_read(here::here("Data/Tidy/argia/", "argia_tidy.gpkg"))
```

## 12 Digit hydrological unit codes (HUC12) polygons from study area

```{r}
#| label: read-huc12
#| message: false
huc12 <- sf::st_read(here::here("Data/Tidy/huc12/", "huc12.gpkg"))
```

# Data Review

## Argia sp observations with HUC12 polygons

```{r}
#| label: argia-huc12-quickplot
leaflet() |> 
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery) |> 
  addPolygons(data=huc12, weight = 2, popup = ~NAME) |> 
  addCircleMarkers(data = argia, color = "black", weight = 1.5,
                   radius = 5, opacity = 1, fillColor = "orange", fillOpacity = 1,
                   popup = ~LOWEST_ID)
```
